definitions.definition: not clearly expressed, known, described, or decided:
examples: I do have a vague memory of meeting her many years ago.

definitions.definition: not clear in shape, or not clearly seen:
examples: Through the mist I could just make out a vague figure.

definitions.definition: A vague person is not able to think clearly, or gives an impression of not thinking clearly in order to hide their real thoughts:
examples: My aunt is incredibly vague - she can never remember where she puts things.
